title: Pork poached in milk with cavolo nero
description: This is a traditional Italian method of cooking pork that makes the meat wonderfully tender. Flavouring the milk with sage and lemon makes the dish extra special.
ingredients: 1 x 750g/1lb 10oz boned pork loin with rind still attached
2 unwaxed lemons, zest removed in strips, cut in half
500g/1lb 2oz waxy potatoes, peeled and left whole
salt and freshly ground black pepper
